chitrakot-falls.name: Chitrakot Waterfalls
chitrakot-falls.description: Known as the Niagara of India, this is the widest waterfall in India.

teerathgarh-falls.name: Teerathgarh Waterfalls
teerathgarh-falls.description: A stunning multi-tiered waterfall inside Kanger Valley National Park.

silver-jubilee-park.name: Silver Jubilee Park
silver-jubilee-park.description: A beautiful park in the heart of Korba, perfect for evening walks and boating.

hasdeo-bango-dam.name: Hasdeo Bango Dam
hasdeo-bango-dam.description: One of the largest dams in Chhattisgarh, offering scenic views and water sports.

buka-lake.name: Buka Lake (Golden Island)
buka-lake.description: An emerging eco-tourism spot known for its island-like vibe and boating.

mainpat.name: Mainpat
mainpat.description: Known as the Shimla of Chhattisgarh, famous for Tibetan settlements.
